item.title:
“Unconditionally” by @KatyPerry has reached 500 MILLION streams on Spotify.
It’s her 13th song to achieve this.
item.author: popcrave
popcrave

item.title:
‘Lover’ by @TaylorSwift13 has reached 6 BILLION streams on Spotify.
It’s her most-streamed album on the platform.
item.author: popcrave

item.title: 12 years ago today, Beyoncé released “Best Thing I Never Had.”
item.author: popcrave

item.title: Taylor Swift’s former 'Cornelia Street' townhouse is currently on the market, listed at $18 MILLION.
item.author: popcrave
